law.catch_line: Fair board member or department official not to be exhibitor.
law.text: No member of the State Fair Board or any official of any department shall be an exhibitor in competition for premium or prize money at any State Fair held while he is a member of the State Fair Board or an official of any department.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4618i-8.
